overviewText: Start the donation by choosing on of the following options:
localDonationButtonTitle: Donate cloth while at the Sock Savior office.
homeDonationButtonTitle: Your donation will be collected at your home.
localDonationExplanation: Choose this option if you are in the Sock Savior office and you can register and hand over your cloth donation directly.
homeDonationExplanation: Choose this option if your donation should be picked up at your home with by a Sock Savior collection truck.
